page.title: 15Buxhall - Education
page.content:
The only school in the area is a {private nursery}taking 10 children aged 3-5 for 2hrs each morning. From 5yrs Buxhall children attend Gt. Finborough Primary School, then at 9yrs Combs Middle School, Stowmarket and at 13yrs Stowmarket High. From High Town Green children attend Rattlesden Primary, Beyton Middle and Stowupland High School.
A{school bus service}operates in the area, free only for children under 8 who travel over 2 miles and children over 8 travelling more than 3 miles. Much of Buxhall lies within 2 miles of Finborough School and several parents resent paying bus charges but have no alternative transport. A{free taxi}to Finborough is provided for 2 children who live more than 1 mile from the bus route.
